problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是斜靠在墙上的长梯,梯脚B距墙角1.4m,楼上点D距离墙1.2m,BD长0.5m,则梯子的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is a long ladder leaning against the wall, the foot of the ladder B is away from the corner of the wall N_0, the upstairs point D is away from the wall N_1, the length of BD is N_2, then the length of the ladder is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的应用；用到的知识点为:平行于三角形一边的直线与三角形另两边相交,截得的两三角形相似；相似三角形的对应边成比例．
